results.title: Until you break
results.brief_description: Elliot Spencer has exceptional music video skills as well as a distinctive visual style. In this piece he explores the notions of masculinity, community dynamics and success & achievement in a dangerous sport.

results.title: Cliche
results.brief_description: “What fears do I have but fear itself? Am I in control? Can the nightmare journey I am on be transcended?” This sophisticated student film shows influences from avant-garde French cinema and features an exceptional original soundtrack.

results.title: Screaming red
results.brief_description: WINNER: Diegesis Festival 2003. This well scripted story is painfully easy to relate to with strong character development and use of sound that shows the assurance of a seasoned short filmmaker. Ruthanne describes her film as “A metaphysical journey of the heart, revealing layers of the teenage psyche.”
